thread.title: Shipping containers take on new life as homes in South Florida - Sun Sentinel
thread.title_full: Shipping containers take on new life as homes in South Florida - Sun Sentinel

author: South Florida Sun-Sentinel
title: Shipping containers take on new life as homes in South Florida - Sun Sentinel
text:
Shipping containers take on new life as homes in South Florida The Container House: three shipper containers into a 1,000-square-foot house Rodrigo Bernstein / Courtesy 
Constructed from three shipping containers, the two-bedroom, two-bathroom house has 1,000 square feet just outside Miami Shores. Stucco and gray paint bedeck the exterior. The interior flooring features beige tile. 
Constructed from three shipping containers, the two-bedroom, two-bathroom house has 1,000 square feet just outside Miami Shores. Stucco and gray paint bedeck the exterior. The interior flooring features beige tile. (Rodrigo Bernstein / Courtesy) The Container House: three shipper containers into a 1,000-square-foot house Rodrigo Bernstein / Courtesy 
Rodrigo Bernstein and his team at The Container House in Hollywood recently converted three shipper containers into a 1,000-square-foot house in unincorporated north Miami-Dade county. The photos show the before and after. 
Rodrigo Bernstein and his team at The Container House in Hollywood recently converted three shipper containers into a 1,000-square-foot house in unincorporated north Miami-Dade county. The photos show the before and after. (Rodrigo Bernstein / Courtesy) See more galleries 
Call it thinking inside and outside the box. Shipyard containers are finding new uses as homes and businesses throughout South Florida. 
The structures are gaining a following as part of the tiny home movement, where people live in smaller spaces that are typically more affordable than traditional houses. There's even a show on HGTV called "Container Homes," which pairs potential homebuyers with builders who can create the boxy home of their dreams. 
Here are some recent homes built from former shipping containers in South Florida.
